sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 14068164 , "FWD SNR parnuk((parnuk.parnec_punit_ip_gpsb_parity_disable_2 ->parnuk.parhinfch_cci.gpsbr_nac_snr.gpsbr_nac_snr_inst.cfg_gpsbr_nac_snr_cgctrl[13] ) - Ac_unsync02 violations ": parnuk.parnec_punit_ip_gpsb_parity_disable_2 is on X12CLK domain and the signal is connected to NAC_CRO_CLK domain leading to metastable flops.
2. 2201682009 , "FWD TGL SBR CDC : Missing synchronizer violation at SoC level run ": Couple of settings are modified in control file.
3. 2201961562 , "FWD TGL SBR : CDC waiver update - combo_logic violation on sbr_clk_clkreq ": CDC waiver updated in this release.
4. 1909179888 , "FWD SNR parvinfch: mentor GLS failures on the Stuckat patterns due to race condition between the rb and psb signals ": fixed in this release.
5. 1406990982 , "FWD Hierarchical Mcast PID 253 is causing segmentation faults in dynamo's C code plugin": Tested with couple of specs.
6. 1406941301 , "FWD Emu failures -CHA spr ": Fixed in this release.
7. 1406896941 , "FWD Credit leakage on multicast loopback messages in Side Band Router ": Fixed in this release.
8. 1406716354 , "FWD (PCR) ADL TFM & HDK requirements - phase 1": Enable for most of the frontend/high priority tools.
9. 1406716217 , "FWD (PCR) Deliver SBR using MAT 1.4.10 TFM ": Enabled in this release.
10. 1406636360 , "Spyglass LINT Enablement for SBR": Spyglass lint is enabled in this release.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_knissues.sip_knissue:
HTML
"SVC does not scale for fabrics with more than 100 nodes"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2016WW42" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/appstore/article/#/sip.bugeco/create?=&subject=bugeco&tenant=sip

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=all&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
